mapper.insert: insert into receivetask (id, receiveaccount, finishtime, iid) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{receiveaccount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{finishtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{iid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select id, receiveaccount, finishtime, iid from receivetask
select count(*) from receivetask where receiveaccount=#{account}
